snippet: The artists are Sammy Baloji, Gloria Cabral, Vasco Mendonça, Miroslav Penkov, Tom Shoval, Sebastián Solórzano Rodríguez and Myles Thatcher.
abstract: The artists are Sammy Baloji, Gloria Cabral, Vasco Mendonça, Miroslav Penkov, Tom Shoval, Sebastián Solórzano Rodríguez and Myles Thatcher.
